Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Uye rangarirai apo ngirozi dzakati: “Iwe Maryam (Mariya)! Zvirokwazvo, Allah vakusarudza vakakuchenura, uye vakakusarudza pamusoro pemadzimai ose epanyika (panguva yake).”
“Iwe Maryam (Mariya)! Iva unozvipira kuna Tenzi vako nekuteerera (Allah, nekuvanamata vari voga) uye ova unoisa chiso chako pasi, uye ova unopfugama pamwe neavo vanopfugama.”

Ichi ndicho chidimbu chenhau kubva mune izvo zvisingaoneki chatiri kudzikisa kwauri (iwe Muhammad (SAW)). Uye wanga usiri pamwechete navo, apo pavaikanda zvinyoreswa zvavo kuti ndeupi pakati pavo achachengeta Maryam (Mariya), uye waisava navo pavaipokana

(Rangarirai) apo ngirozi dzakati: “Iwe Maryam (Mariya)! Zvirokwazvo, Allah vari kukupa mashoko akanaka eshoko kubva kwavari, zita rake anenge achinzi Mesiya Isa (Jesu), mwanakomana waMariya, acharemekedzwa pasi rose uye nekudenga, uye achange ari umwe weavo vari pedyo naAllah.”
“Achataura kuvanhu ari kacheche uye akura, uye achange ari umwe weavo vanoita mabasa akanaka.”

Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndingave sei nemwanakomana pasina murume akandibata?” Akati: “Naizvozvo Allah vanosika zvavanoda. Kana vachida kuita chinhu, zvirokwazvo vanoti kwachiri: “Ivapo!” uye chinobva chavapo
Uye ivo (Allah) vachamudzidzisa Gwaro nehungwaru, uye neTorah uye neInjeel (Vhangeri)

Uye vachamuita kuti ave mutumwa kuvana vaIzirairi (achiti): “Zvirokwazvo, ndakuvigirai chiratidzo kubva kuna Tenzi venyu, zvekuti ndinokuumbirai kubva kuvhu, chiumbwa chinenge shiri, uye ndochifemera machiri, chinobva chaita shiri nekuda kwaAllah; uye ndinoporesa uyo akaberekwa ari bofu uye neuyo ane maperembudzi, uye ndinomutsa vakafa nesimba raAllah. Uye ndinokuudzai izvo zvamunodya pamwe neizvo zvamunochengeta mudzimba dzenyu. Zvirokwazvo, mukati meizvi mune chiratidzo kwamuri, kana muri vatendi

Uye ndauya kuzotsigira izvo zvakanga zviripo ndisati ndavapo kubva muTorah, uye kuzokubvumidzai zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakanga zvakarambidzwa kwamuri, uye ndauya kwamuri nehumboo kubva kuna Tenzi venyu. Naizvozvo, ityai Allah mova munonditeerera
Zvirokwazvo! Allah ndiTenzi vangu uye Tenzi venyu, naizvozvo vanamatei (Allah vari voga). Iyi ndiyo nzira yakatwasuka.”

Apo Isa (Jesu) paakazoona kusatenda kwavo akati: “Ndivanani vachava vabatsiri vangu munzira yaAllah?” Vadzidzi vakati: “Tiri vabatsiri vaAllah, tinotenda muna Allah, uye tinopupura kuti zvirokwazvo tiri vatendi (maMuslim).”
“Tenzi vedu! Tinotenda pane izvo zvamatumira pasi, uye tinotevedzera mutumwa (Jesu), saka tinyorei pasi pakati pevapupuri.”
Uye vakaronga (vasingatendi kuti vauraye Jesu), uye Allah vakarongawo. Asi Allah ndivo murongi anogonesesa pakati pevarongi vese
